description: Top 20 entities + common answers + quick facts - 31% of queries (workflow-enriched)

how_to_add_endpoint: 3. Create service in backend/app/services/ if needed
how_to_add_model: 3. Run: alembic revision --autogenerate && alembic upgrade head
common_answers.how_to_fix_401: Call logout() from authStore on 401 to trigger app-level redirect
common_answers.docker_restart_vs_build: docker-compose restart != rebuild. Code changes require docker-compose build first
common_answers.so_broadcast: Raw sockets require sock.setsockopt(SOL_SOCKET, SO_BROADCAST, 1) for broadcast addresses
common_answers.pattern_explicit_verification_prevents: Explicit verification prevents silent failures in knowledge loading.
common_answers.pattern_listing_skills_at_session_star: Listing skills at session start creates transparency and accountability.
common_answers.pattern_explicit_skill_invocation_make: Explicit skill invocation makes decision-making transparent.
common_answers.pattern_terse_documentation_is_faster_: Terse documentation is faster to parse for both humans and AI.
common_answers.pattern__make_the_implicit_explicit___: "Make the implicit explicit" - visibility builds trust.
common_answers.pattern_for_pre_reviewed_changes__dire: For pre-reviewed changes, direct application beats merge/rebase complexity.
common_answers.pattern_knowledge_graph_grows_incremen: Knowledge graph grows incrementally with each enhancement.
common_answers.pattern_persistent_workflow_logs_creat: Persistent workflow logs create institutional memory for AI agent systems
common_answers.pattern_standardized_log_structure_ena: Standardized log structure enables programmatic analysis and agent context retrieval
common_answers.avoid_showing_retry_login_buttons_on: AVOID: Showing Retry/Login buttons on individual pages creates inconsistent auth UX
common_answers.pattern_when_handling_401_errors_in_pa: When handling 401 errors in page components, call `logout()` from the auth store to trigger app-level redirect instead of showing page-level error UI
common_answers.pattern_critical_emissions_consistentl: Critical emissions consistently missing (SESSION 93%, AKIS_LOADED 93%, SKILLS_USED 96.5%)
common_answers.pattern_no_protocol_for_interrupts_des: No protocol for interrupts despite being 100% MANDATORY in docs
common_answers.pattern_no_retry_logic__no_error_categ: No retry logic, no error categorization, no escalation protocol
common_answers.pattern_baseline__13_7_____target_mech: Baseline (13.7%) + target mechanisms (gates, validation) = projected compliance (85%)
common_answers.pattern_most_adjustments_are_enforceme: Most adjustments are enforcement mechanisms, not new protocols
common_answers.pattern_terms_like__simple____complex_: Terms like "simple", "complex", "significant" are subjective without thresholds
common_answers.pattern_layered_architecture___full_ty: Layered architecture + full typing with dependency injection
common_answers.pattern_component_composition___typesc: Component composition + TypeScript interfaces with React.FC
common_answers.pattern_compact_filter_layouts_improve: Compact filter layouts improve usability on pages with many interactive elements
common_answers.pattern_security_focused_filtering__vu: Security-focused filtering (vulnerable assets) provides immediate value for penetration testing workflows
common_answers.pattern_visual_prominence_____emoji__b: Visual prominence (⚠️ emoji, bold text) enforces critical protocols
common_answers.pattern_structured_skill_suggestions_e: Structured skill suggestions enable systematic knowledge capture
common_answers.pattern_formalizing_workflow_logging_a: Formalizing workflow logging as a skill ensures consistency
common_answers.pattern_successfully_applied_to_40__to: Successfully applied to 40+ toggle instances across 6 components.
common_answers.pattern_structured_log_sections_enable: Structured log sections enable automated pattern extraction
common_answers.pattern_log_mining_creates_continuous_: Log mining creates continuous knowledge accumulation
common_answers.pattern_api_base_url___fetch___workflo: API_BASE_URL + fetch() workflow replacing hardcoded arrays
common_answers.pattern_track_source_ips_only_for_pass: Track SOURCE IPs only for passive discovery
common_answers.pattern_reuse_existing_backend_endpoin: Reuse existing backend endpoint in Settings
common_answers.pattern_separate_docker_compose_file_f: Separate docker-compose file for test hosts
common_answers.pattern_tailwind_fontsize_config_shoul: Tailwind fontSize config should use rem units to respect root font-size
common_answers.pattern___remove_explanatory_text__kee: - Remove explanatory text, keep only commands

description: Per-domain entity indexes - Fast O(1) lookup
Historical issues + solutions - 75% debug acceleration (enriched from workflow logs)

db_connection.solution: Check docker-compose up -d db, verify DATABASE_URL env

alembic_conflict.solution: alembic merge heads, then alembic upgrade head

websocket_timeout.solution: Check nginx proxy_read_timeout, guacamole ping interval

typescript_error.symptom: TypeScript type errors after model change
typescript_error.solution: Regenerate types from OpenAPI, check frontend/src/types/

docker_build_fail.symptom: Docker build fails with memory error

agent_connection.solution: Check SOCKS proxy config, verify agent WS endpoint

clean_separation.solution: Moving test services to dedicated compose file eliminated network conflicts

conservative_limits.solution: Resource limits prevent runaway containers on shared systems

documentation.solution: Comprehensive guide helps new users understand resource management  ### Rejected Alternatives

external_network_approach.solution: Would require pre-creating network, adding setup complexity

no_static_ips.solution: Test nodes need predictable addresses for scanning/testing

build_time_limits_only.symptom: Related to: build time limits only
build_time_limits_only.solution: Docker Compose doesn't support build resource limits directly

aggressive_limits.solution: Too restrictive would cause performance issues  ### Skill Application - **Skill #7 (Commit Frequently)**: Two separate commits for logical separation - **Skill #12 (Document Decisions)**: Created DOCK

pattern.solution: When handling 401 errors in page components, call `logout()` from the auth store to trigger app-level redirect instead of showing page-level error UI

anti_pattern.solution: Showing Retry/Login buttons on individual pages creates inconsistent auth UX

network_isolation.solution: Backend containers need explicit network connections to reach test hosts    - Solution: docker-compose.yml external networks + docker network connect    - Pitfall: Manual connections don't persist acr

vulnerability_data.solution: Nmap --script vuln output is unstructured text    - Solution: Keyword-based parsing with regex for CVE extraction    - Improvement needed: Structured vulnerability databases (CVE API integration)

frontend_performance.solution: Bulk enrichment prevents N+1 queries    - Pattern: Single query for all vulnerabilities, build lookup dict    - Applied to: vulnerable_count, has_been_accessed, has_been_exploited  ### Process

test_data_creation.solution: Real scans didn't find vulnerabilities on test hosts    - Solution: Created manual test data for demo purposes    - Production: Need actual vulnerable test targets (DVWA, WebGoat)

iterative_refinement.solution: Badge layout went through 3 iterations    - v1: Horizontal inline badges (crowded, no sorting)    - v2: 2-column with vertical badges (ports still horizontal)    - v3: 3-column grid with all vertical

docker_caching.solution: When rebuilds don't reflect code changes, need full environment wipe

missing_imports.solution: Adding logger.info() calls requires logger to be defined in that module

external_networks.solution: Docker Compose external networks must be created before `docker-compose up`

why_is_raw_socket_failing_with.symptom: Why is raw socket failing with Permission denied?

format_preference.solution: Original workflow format preferred over condensed tables

docker_network_creation.solution: docker-compose creates networks defined in the file automatically

dynamic_connection.solution: `docker network connect` allows connecting running containers to networks

network_independence.solution: Services don't need to be in same compose file to share network  ### Best Practices

separation_of_concerns.solution: Main services should not depend on test environment

auto_creation.solution: Prefer automatic resource creation over manual setup scripts

optional_features.solution: Debugging capabilities should be opt-in, not required  ### Project Patterns - Main docker-compose.yml: Production services only - docker-compose.test.yml: Vulnerable/test services with resource limits

create_reusable_neontoggle_com.symptom: Create reusable NeonToggle component vs inline replacements?

how_to_merge_stat_cards_with_a.symptom: How to merge stat cards with activity sections?

structured_progression_prevents_forgetti.symptom: Related to: structured progression prevents forgetting
structured_progression_prevents_forgetti.solution: Phase tracking with mandatory checklist ensures agents can't skip LEARN/COMPLETE

cognitive_load_matters.solution: 226→180 lines (-20%) increases compliance through reduced scanning overhead

separation_of_concerns_works.symptom: Related to: separation of concerns works

horizontal_+_vertical_tracking_essential.symptom: Related to: horizontal + vertical tracking essential
horizontal_+_vertical_tracking_essential.solution: `progress=H/V` enables context recovery during nested interrupts  ### Protocol Enforcement

mandatory_markers_increase_compliance.symptom: Related to: mandatory markers increase compliance

self_checking_prevents_drift.symptom: Related to: self checking prevents drift
self_checking_prevents_drift.solution: AKIS Init verification on every response creates autocorrect loop

stateless_checks_better_than_stateful.symptom: Related to: stateless checks better than stateful
stateless_checks_better_than_stateful.solution: Don't check previous response (context overflow), just emit now

simplicity_over_completeness.solution: 2-item checklist (WHAT/WHO) better than 3-item (WHAT/WHO/HOW) - overhead matters  ### Agent Behavior Predictions

edge_cases_where_agents_drift_100%.symptom: Related to: edge cases where agents drift 100%
edge_cases_where_agents_drift_100%.solution: - Long conversations >100k tokens (protocol truncated from context)    - User interrupts mid-phase (forget to emit [PHASE] when resuming)    - Simple Q&A that escalates (skip init because started as q

what_actually_works.solution: - Single mandatory action per checkpoint (emit [PHASE])     - Visual format (tables, checklists, examples)     - Clear defaults (if unsure, default to CONTEXT phase)  ---

sse_vs_batch.solution: For operations where user must wait anyway (traceroute+probe), batch JSON response is simpler and faster than SSE streaming

asyncio.gather().solution: Effective for parallel async operations, reduces total wait time from sum to max

global_state.solution: Zustand stores work well for cross-component state like activity indicators

standard.solution: Use `html { font-size: Npx; }` as single source of truth for app-wide font scaling

font_family.solution: JetBrains Mono as primary → Source Code Pro → Fira Code → system fallbacks

description: Service→Model→Endpoint→Page chains - 14% of queries (enhanced with frontend)

purpose: Quick domain overview - Read first for context, then query specific domains below
